_sText:
Map Tier: 3.5-4 out of 5. I consider it a tier 3.5-4 because of the window jumps and very small peg jumps combined with the long jumps and general spacing of the blocks. Everything is kz, because I just don't see the point of putting triggers.

The end room is a teaser to one of my future maps, not saying its the next one but its in the future :).

I will be porting it over to CS:GO, however I don't know if I will be putting that version on gamebanana.

Sorry about the file size, its a little big but there is a lot of music and ambience.

I have worked on this map quite a bit, I am not very happy with how it turned out though. I made a lot of mistakes that I wouldn't make with what I now know about mapping, this map taught me a lot and thus it deservers its showing. I know its not too long but I couldn't bring myself to make it any longer, hopefully my next map will live up to my expectations.

I assume this map should take around 3~ minutes for the average hopper, but I can see speed runners bringing it down to 45 seconds~. I don't consider it easy to speed run at all, and I cant wait to see what kind of routes you guys can come up with.

Songs: (In The Order Played) 21~ minutes of music.
Blackmill - Friend /
Blackmill - Home /
Blackmill - The Light /
Imagined Herbal Flows - Chinese Dreams
